description: The backend JWT Guard implementation depends on the Cognito User Pool infrastructure being provisioned.
mitigation_plan: DevOps to provide Cognito Pool ARN and region as soon as it's created.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks all secure backend API development.

description: Frontend history persistence requires the global authenticated API client to be implemented first.
mitigation_plan: Tasks are assigned to ensure logical sequence.
impact_if_delayed: Delays implementation of all data persistence features.

description: The formula execution sandbox is not useful until users can create and save formulas through the UI.
mitigation_plan: Define the JSON format for the formula definition early so BE can develop against a mock.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire custom mode execution feature.

description: The Sync Manager logic depends on the IndexedDB queuing service to store and retrieve offline actions.
mitigation_plan: Develop against a well-defined interface for the queue service.
impact_if_delayed: Delays completion of the offline feature.
